ygData.subject: Re: The houseplant and the goons
ygData.msgSnippet: Devilcat scratches his chin.  It would seem to me that whatever ruckus is happening, the Tripred forces are getting the better of it - otherwise why would

Devilcat scratches his chin.  "It would seem to me that whatever 
ruckus is happening, the Tripred forces are getting the better of it -
 otherwise why would they spare a ship and crew to this dirtball?  If 
that is the case, it puts the Rogues and the Maximals on the same 
side of the battlefield, temporarily at least."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil nodded. That was a resonnable offer and Devilcat seemed
> inclined to negotiate with him.
> 
> Yggdrasil: I can't tell much of what was directly happening on
> Cybertron because I was stationed on a backwater world before coming
> here. However, they sent me here to fetch Talos. As Talos is a great
> leader of men, I assume they needed him for either a large-scale
> operation or a military planning. Either way, I believe the so-
called
> Tripredacus are some important military guys, and I think they could
> be aiming for Cybertron. What they're here for, though... Could be
> they're seeking the Ark or the Nemesis, but your bet's as good as
> mine. I don't really know about them except as rumors as an
> underground organization, but I don't think the Preds are with them,
> at least not in practice.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > "It's not wise to make demands of someone who could kill you out 
of 
> > hand," Devilcat warns.  "But in any event, I'm prepared to return 
you 
> > to your Maximal brethren - IF you can help us in dealing with 
these 
> > Tripredacus buffoons.  Now, what was the status of Cybertron as 
you 
> > left it?"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > If Yggdrasil Prime had had a mouth, he would have made a very 
> > > sarcastic smile right now.
> > > 
> > > Yggdrasil: Ah! So you want my help? I don't mind giving my 
advice, 
> > but 
> > > I do have a price, you know... It is not a very costly one, 
rest 
> > > assured, but you will have to give if you wish to receive...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > Jayde returns after a few moments, with Devilcat.  The leader 
of 
> > the 
> > > > Rogues doesn't beat around the bush:  "There's been a rather 
> > > > unexpected development.  Our sensor records tell us that a 
second 
> > > > wave of Tripredacus forces have arrived on this planet.  In 
our 
> > > > opinion, this is trouble.  You have a more recent idea of the 
> > > > situation on Cybertron than us.  What are your thoughts?"
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Yggdrasil doesn't acknowledge Jayde's departure. He just 
goes 
> > on 
> > > > > thinking about how a band of rebel maximals could go so low 
as 
> > to 
> > > > go 
> > > > > against all their teachings.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Yggdrasil: And with Pumpskin now in predacon hands... 
Primus 
> > help 
> > > > > me...
